COMMENTS: This is a JSON file mapping each instrument to a set of WAV sample files.
Samples of the UC Davis Gamelan Ensemble, recorded for ketuk-ketik.com by Elisa Hough
'detune_rate' is 0 by default, applies to Balinese Gamelan (beats per second between paired instruments).
'continuation_note' in the score means the previous note will continue playing.
'rest_note' in the score means the previous note will stop.
'samples_host' is a URL to where the samples can be downloaded from (if they're not local).
'samples_cache' is a relative path to the samples on disk.
If a sample file doesn't exist under samples_cache, it will be copied from samples_host.
'instruments' is a named set of instruments.  Parameters:
'unpaired': (if you use detune_rate) this will opt out of detuning
'samples': mapping of note symbols to the WAV file to play
